I am a Software Quality Assurance Analyst || ISTQB¬Æ Certified Tester || CIPS (Canada‚Äôs Association of I.T. Professionals) Member

From an early age, I have always been deeply interested in computing. In my opinion, nothing on the planet can measure the exponential growth and excitement in the computing industry, an industry of which I am proud to be a part, particularly Software Engineering. With the right knowledge and skills, everything can be automated, and manual procedures can be eliminated. This is my motivation. In the face of an unpredictably evolving world, I want to create efficient, dependable, and safe systems (apps, websites).

**Here's a quick summary about me**:

- üòä Pronouns: Her/she
- üí° Fun fact:
  - I graduated from AltSchool Africa, [School of Software Engineering](https://altschoolafrica.com/schools/engineering) Class of 2022.

  - I was part of [Quales Tech Cohort 11 Software Testers](https://www.quales.tech/).
  - I graduated with Distinction from [Conestoga College](https://www.conestogac.on.ca/), Software Quality Assurance and Test Engineering, Class of 2024.
- üå± A never-ending cycle of learning Manual and Automated Testing using Postman, Cypress, Selenium, and Playwright.
- üíº Job interests: Software Quality Assurance Analyst.
